nydailynews.title: Swinger magazine inspired woman to sleep with 3,000 men
nydailynews.topComment: "Polyamory??" That word, it does not mean what you think it means. It means multiple long-lasting love relationships, with the knowledge and consent of all concerned. Look it up, dumb reporter, you just make your paper look stupid.

nydailynews.title: Suspect in Copenhagen attacks shot, killed by Danish police
nydailynews.topComment: Religion. A plague on the species.
